title.en: Prayer to Jamyang Khyentse Chökyi Lodrö1

text.en: Knower of the three times, Orgyen Tötreng Tsal,
text.en-trans: dü sum khyenpa orgyen tötreng tsal

text.en: Vimalamitra, who attained the vajra body of great transference,
text.en-trans: po chen dorjé kur zheng bimala

text.en: And Lord Tri Songdetsen, initiator of the teachings in the Land of Snows—
All were embodied in the magical manifestation of Khyentse Wangpo.
text.en-trans: nam sum gyutrul chikdü khyentsé wang

text.en: To the lord of the maṇḍala, Chökyi Lodrö,
I pray with intense and heartfelt devotion:
text.en-trans: nying né gü dung drakpö solwa deb

text.en: Lovingly guide and care for me without ever parting,
text.en-trans: taktu dralmé tsewé jesu zung té

text.en: And grant your blessings, so that my mind and your wisdom merge as one.
text.en-trans: tuk yi ro chik drepar jingyi lob
